tool_description: Performs conditional logic based on specified criteria. Allows for branching behavior with 'if' conditions.

arguments.name: lhs
arguments.description: The left-hand side of the condition

arguments.name: rhs
arguments.description: The right-hand side of the condition

arguments.name: if_true
arguments.description: The set of tools to be executed if the condition is true. Use $$PREV[i] to reference the value of the ith tool in the chain.

arguments.name: else_if
arguments.description: Array of 'else if' conditions, each with its own criteria and actions

arguments.name: else
arguments.description: The set of tools to be executed if the condition is false. Use $$PREV[i] to reference the value of the ith tool in the chain.

tool_description: Iterates over a list of items and applies a set of tools to each item

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: List of items to iterate over

arguments.name: tools
arguments.description: List of tools to apply to each item

tool_description: Executes a set of tools repeatedly while a specified condition is true.

arguments.name: condition
arguments.description: The condition that must be true for the loop to continue. This is typically a comparison of two values.

arguments.name: tools
arguments.description: List of tools to apply repeatedly as long as the condition is true.

arguments.name: max_iterations
arguments.description: Optional limit to the number of iterations to prevent infinite loops.
